Headline: #26 South Shore Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near 106th/Buffalo
ShortDescription: NB 26 South Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted via 106th, Muskegon, Commercial, 100th, Ave. L, and 106th due to, street blockage near 106th/Buffalo.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #26 South Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted via 106th, Muskegon, Commercial, 100th, Ave. L, and 106th due to, street blockage near 106th/Buffalo.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland Temporary Reroute at Narragansett/Wellington
ShortDescription: 86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temp. rerouted: Narragansett, Belmont, Oak Park, Diversey, and Narragansett, due to construction at Narragansett/Wellington.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily  rerouted in both directions via Narragansett, Belmont, Oak Park, Diversey, and Narragansett, due to construction at Narragansett/Wellington.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #36 Broadway Temporary Reroute at Broadway/Sheridan
ShortDescription: 36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted via Broadway, Sheridan, Irving Park, and Broadway due to, construction at Broadway/Sheridan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Broadway, Sheridan, Irving Park, and Broadway due to, construction at Broadway/Sheridan.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at Greenwood/78th
ShortDescription: 79 79th  buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Cottage Grove, 76th, South Chicago and Stony Island: due to, street blockage near Greenwood/78th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#79 79th  buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Cottage Grove, 76th, South Chicago and Stony Island: due to, street blockage near Greenwood/78th.

Headline: #26 South Shore Express Temporary Southbound Reroute near Ewing/92nd
ShortDescription: SB 26 South Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted via: 91st, Mackinaw, Harbor, South Chicago, 95th and Ewing due to, street blockage near Ewing/92nd..

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #26 South Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted via 91st, Mackinaw, Harbor, South Chicago, 95th and Ewing including the normal route streets at the beginning and end due to street blockage near Ewing/92nd.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
